short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a strong password based on user-specified length

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Generator

Version 0.1.0

Description:

Simplify your password creation process with the Password Generator extension! This handy tool allows you to generate secure, random passwords based on your specific requirements.

Features:

Customizable Specifications: Choose from the following options to tailor your password:
Lowercase letters (a-z)
Uppercase letters (A-Z)
Digits (0-9)
Symbols (~!@#$%^&*)
Generate Password: Click the "Generate Password" button to create a random password that meets your selected criteria.
Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy your generated password to the clipboard with the "Copy" button for quick and convenient use.
Why Choose Password Generator?

Secure: Ensure your passwords are strong and unique.
Easy to Use: Simple interface with checkboxes to customize your password.
Convenient: Generate and copy passwords with just a few clicks.
Perfect for enhancing your online security with minimal effort. Try it out now and keep your accounts safe with strong, random passwords!

Permissions: This extension does not require any special permissions.
